title: Redeemer: Enhanced Edition + HotFix
body:
Redeemer: Enhanced Edition + HotFix


Genres/Tags: Action, Brawler, Top-down, 3D
Companies: Sobaka Studio / Gambitious Digital Entertainment
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI7
Original Size: 2.7 GB
Repack Size: 1.4 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + 2 (Uploaded by Uria Urikra and hermietkreeft, compatible with torrent)
  • Filehoster: WorldSrc (NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Redeemer.Enhanced.Edition-CODEX ISO release: codex-redeemer.enhanced.edition.iso (2,810,150,912 bytes)
  • Redeemer.Enhanced.Edition.Hotfix-CODEX (92 MB) applied over
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 2.7 to 1.4 GB)
  • Installation takes 2-6 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 5 GB (~9 GB during installation)
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • Repack by FitGirl

Game Description

REDEEMER is an intense Brawler where you will punch, hack and blast your way through enemies using fists, hammers, fire arms and even the environment. It grabs the genre by the throat and drags it into 2017 in brutal style by adding a deep melee combat system and numerous unique types of kills. Redeemer is the brawler for those who love brawlers and have been waiting for a modern take on the genre!

Play as Vasily, an elite operative who once worked for one of the biggest Cybernetic Weapons Manufacturers in the world. Officially working in security, you were tasked with infiltration, assassination, extortion and even torture. When eventually the corporation decided to turn you into one of its cyborg soldiers, you manage to narrowly escape to a secluded monastery deep in the snowy mountains.

For 20 years you tried to find peace and harmony amongst your fellow monks, but you are still too haunted by your murderous past to find either. Now after all of these years the corporation is finally closing-in on your location, and in so doing they have given you one last shot at redemption.

What’s new in Enhanced Edition?

  • Here’s a full list of all updates below:
  • New Upgrade Skill Tree system
  • Local Co-Op Mode
  • Chinese Localization Support
  • Improved Level Balance
  • Several new weapons, including a powerful shovel
  • New highlight system for environmental objects
  • Improved animations for throwable pickup objects
  • Enemies are now more colorful and visible in dark spaces
  • Select Achievement unlock conditions have been improved
  • Vasily can no longer pick-up the regular electro baton
  • A thousand additional smaller fixes and improvements

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with the initial one.
